attributes.action: No longer make working for a Security Firm a Conflict of intrest with joining the Special Constabulary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you applied to join as a Special Constable and work for a Security Company you won't be accepted as it is deemed as a conflict of intrest. I think that this should be removed and a law put in saying if you work for a Security Company only on duty can you use your powers of a constable.
